before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"fmig4","text":"SEC Buffer:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f9kdd","text":"25 mM HEPES pH 7.5","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d7r00","text":"150 mM NaCl","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6nn15","text":"Freshly added: 1 mM DTT","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4mqbv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2k9kl","text":"Purify tagged bait and prey proteins","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"kmer","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"54vta","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"protocols","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"id":83006,"title":"EXPRESSION AND PURIFICATION OF HUMAN NEMO (GST-GFP-NEMO)","title_html":"EXPRESSION AND PURIFICATION OF HUMAN NEMO (GST-GFP-NEMO)","load_collapsed":true,"uri":"expression-and-purification-of-human-nemo-gst-gfp-cva6w2he","image":{"source":"https://www.protocols.io/img/default_protocol.png","webp_source":null,"placeholder":"https://www.protocols.io/img/default_protocol.png","webp_placeholder":null},"creator":{"name":"OLIVIA HARDING","affiliation":null,"affiliation_url":null,"username":"olivia--harding","link":null,"image":{"source":"/img/avatars/015.png","placeholder":"/img/avatars/015.png","webp_source":""}},"stats":{"number_of_steps":23},"type_id":1,"guid":"C6FD5DC0055011EEB8541B64363285E1"}}}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"f6mi6","text":"This protocol describes how to perform microscopy-based bead protein-protein interaction assay with GST- or mCherry-tagged proteins as baits and fluorescently-tagged proteins as preys. The protocol requires to have purified proteins and allows to monitor protein-protein interaction in an equilibrium state. The fluorescent signal can be quantified.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

funders.grant_id: :          Mechanisms of mitochondrial damage control by PINK1 and Parkin (ASAP-000350)

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5avd7","text":"Equilibrate   Glutathione Sepharose 4B or RFP-Trap Agarose beads with   SEC buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":12,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":70,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8lcup","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dg0n8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5hdq5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"20","error":false,"guid":"F8EBCE70055011EEB8541B64363285E1","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"FAA87290055011EEB8541B64363285E1","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2ep5e","text":"Prepare these bead equilibrations for each condition.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"e24b1","text":"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2d5jd","text":"Incubate equilibrated beads with GST- or mCherry-tagged bait protein for a final concentration of   in SEC buffer for   at   with gentle rotation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":98,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":118,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":123,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d2a5d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"5","error_concentration":false,"guid":"459226C0055111EEB8541B64363285E1","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"4D197D30055111EEB8541B64363285E1","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"4F9B9430055111EEB8541B64363285E1","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"38goj","text":"Remove the supernatant and wash beads with   SEC buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":43,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1mt04","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"80F9F9E0055111EEB8541B64363285E1","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"d3gqr","text":"Repeat for a total of 2 washes, then discard buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3u32q","text":"Add   SEC buffer to achieve a beads:buffer ratio of 1:1","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c5dvi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"20","error":false,"guid":"9FE6B190055111EEB8541B64363285E1","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"anf3u","text":"Incubate the plate for   in the dark at   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":23,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":40,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eeish","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"43288450055211EEB8541B64363285E1","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"4A720E70055211EEB8541B64363285E1","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2pg8f","text":"Use a microscope configured to detect fluorescent signal (e.g. Zeiss LSM 700 confocal microscope equipped with Plan-Apochromat 20X/0.8 objective)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"58f7r","text":"Acquire fluorescent images in the middle section of the beads and collect more than one image for each well","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9k8l5","text":"Also acquire bright field images for each field","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"135vv","text":"Draw several lines across each bead in the fluorescent channel and measure the intensity along the lines","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8jipr","text":"For background correction, measure the average intensity of a rectangular ROI that covers an area of each field of view with no beads","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9bp7g","text":"Subtract the average intensity of the background ROI from each bead maximum in that field","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"kcuf","text":"Calculate the average of the background-corrected maximum intensities of beads for each sample ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Microscopy-based bead protein-protein interaction assay
